My thoughts on life after playing dota 2 for 4 years : "Someone just fucking kill me already"

Dota 2 is an amazing game. Surprised they offer it for free. It's like a game of chess. Every move you make and second you waste with make a difference throughout the game you are in. If that's the style of game you like to play then I highly recommend it. Also has a huge community
